main.message: Turning ideas into code and dreams into reality.
main.aboutMe: Pleasure, I'm Caio Henrique Rodrigues, a 22-year-old full-stack developer, currently in my final year of Information Systems at Universidade Unifafibe. My initial training in Systems Development at Etec Bebedouro gave me a solid foundation in area. I am looking for opportunities to expand my knowledge and face new challenges. My passion for technology and innovation drives me to seek creative and high-quality solutions. my skills and deliver a meaningful impact.
main.project2C: Project 2C is an innovative idea in combating fraud, it is the integration of an open source biometric engine made with Rust, it has the ability to compare faces and score the similarity between compared faces.
main.barberPass: It is a project focused on generating long-distance passwords for barbers and hairdressers, it generates a password to mark their place in the queue, so the professional can work with an easier arrival time without problems with people outside the queue
main.newXp: It's a Pomodoro clock created for developers and students. When the timer is reset, a basic exercise is generated to perform after long periods in front of a computer.
